Text @tbl-chi-square-exp

$$
\chi^2 = \cfrac{(O - E)^2}{E}
$$

```{=tex}
\begin{align*} 
\chi^2 &= \cfrac{(23 - 20.82)^2}{20.82} + \cfrac{(10 - 12.18)^2}{12.18} + \\
&\phantom{=}\;\; \cfrac{(18 - 20.18)^2}{20.18} + \cfrac{(14 - 11.82)^2}{11.82} = 1.25
\end{align*}
```
Test

```{r}

mat <- matrix(c(23, 10, 18, 14), byrow = TRUE, nrow = 2)
chisq.test(mat, correct = FALSE)

```

$\chi^2_{\alpha=5\%} = `r round(qchisq(p = 0.05, df = 1, lower.tail = FALSE), 2)`$
